sentences.en: 41 A smooth sea never made a skillful mariner.
A mariner is a sailor employed by a ship's company.
sentences.cn: 水手是受雇于轮船公司的海员.

sentences.en: A mariner must have his eye upon rocks and sands as well as upon the North Star.
sentences.cn: 海员不仅要盯着北极星,还要注意暗礁和险滩.

sentences.en: A smooth sea neer made a skillful mariner.
sentences.cn: 平静的大海决不能造就出熟练的水手.

sentences.en: A smooth sea never made a skillful mariner.
sentences.cn: 平静的大海决不能造就熟练的水手.

sentences.en: A smooth sea never makes a skillful mariner.
sentences.cn: 平静的大海造就不出熟练的水手。

sentences.en: A smooth sea not happen ago did a skillful mariner.
sentences.cn: 平静的大海决无所不能造就出熟练的水手.

sentences.en: A smooth sea not happen before did a skillful mariner.
sentences.cn: 平静的大海无所不能造就出熟练的水手.

sentences.en: But like a mariner, I can chart my course by your light.
sentences.cn: 但我可以像水手一样, 用你的光亮指引我的航行.

sentences.en: Coleridge contributed the famous Rime of the Ancient Mariner.
sentences.cn: 柯勒律治贡献了著名的《老水手之歌》.

sentences.en: He recited the whole of The Ancient Mariner to us off the reel.
sentences.cn: 他一口气把《古水手吟》从头到尾都背诵出来了.

sentences.en: Mariner 10 is the only spacecraft ever to have visited Mercury ( 1974 - 75 ).
sentences.cn: 水手10号是唯一访问过水星 ( 1974～1975 ) 的宇宙飞船.

sentences.en: The Age of Exploration. The Mariner's Museum, Newport News , VA.
sentences.cn: 探索的年代. 水手博物馆, 纽波特纽斯, 梵谛冈.

sentences.en: The figure of the Ancient Mariner has been variously interpreted.
sentences.cn: 对于《古舟子咏》中的人物,一直有着各种各样的理解.

sentences.en: The mariner followed the sea for fifty years.
sentences.cn: 这位水手航海达五十年之久.

sentences.en: The old mariner liked to yarn about his sea adventures.
sentences.cn: 老水手喜欢讲他的海上奇遇.

words.tran_cn: 船舶的；海生的；海产的；航海的，海运的
海运业；舰队；水兵；（海军）士兵或军官
